name: Basketball Hero VR
description: This is a vr basketball game with a few new things in the genre! There are currently 5 different maps and multiple other things to do. You can go to the Great Crater and enjoy a relaxing basketball game, or just jump of the side to dunk. There is a normal basketball court and a ANTI-GRAVITY COURT!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or RX 570 or better. Sound Card: Anything Additional Notes: This does have graphical settings and even a 1080 has issues on maximum
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 or RX 580 or better. Sound Card: Anything Additional Notes: This does have graphical settings and even a 1080 has issues on maximum
